name: symgtrf
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

body.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

stmt.origin: mpbird(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c2))
stmt.pretty: mpbird(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1, (hs0 : c2 ↔ c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c2))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c2))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cpmtr, c2), cfv(cpmtr, c2))
-| wceq(c0, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (hs0 ∈ c0 →(hs0 : c2 ↔ c2))
⊣ (pmTrsp ` c2)=(pmTrsp ` c2)
⊣ c0 = ran((pmTrsp ` c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c2)))
-| wceq(cfv(cpmtr, c2), cfv(cpmtr, c2))
-| wceq(c0, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ⊆ c1
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, c1)
⊣ (hs0 ∈ c0 →(hs0 ∈ c1 ↔(hs0 : c2 ↔ c2)))
⊣ (pmTrsp ` c2)=(pmTrsp ` c2)
⊣ c0 = ran((pmTrsp ` c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c2)))
-| wceq(c0, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ⊆ c1
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, c1)
⊣ (hs0 ∈ c0 →(hs0 ∈ c1 ↔(hs0 : c2 ↔ c2)))
⊣ c0 = ran((pmTrsp ` c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c2)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(csymg, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ (hs0 ∈ c0 →(hs0 ∈ c1 ↔(hs0 : c2 ↔ c2)))
⊣ c3 =(SymGrp ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c2)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(csymg, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ⊆ c1
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, c1)
⊣ c0 = ran((pmTrsp ` c2))
⊣ c3 =(SymGrp ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c2)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(csymg, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ⊆ c1
⊣ d(hs0, c1)
⊣ c0 = ran((pmTrsp ` c2))
⊣ c3 =(SymGrp ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c2)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(csymg, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ⊆ c1
⊣ c0 = ran((pmTrsp ` c2))
⊣ c3 =(SymGrp ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)

comment: Transpositions are elements of the symmetric group. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Aug-2015.)
